humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, there is metastatic carcinoma present in one out of one lymph node in the sentinel lymph node of the right axilla (A1). This corresponds to N1 stage as per Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. The fact that there are no metastases in the remaining 35 lymph nodes (C) supports this prediction.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma present in one out of one lymph node from the sentinel lymph node dissection in the right axilla (A1). This is consistent with N1 stage. The total number of lymph nodes involved is not provided, so we cannot determine if there is any substaging information.
